name: EGL2022-TopDownRPG
description:
Projects for Week 4 to 6 (unfinished)

Contrast Explained for Week 5:

This 2D RPG features some static yet animated slimes versus a player-controlled warrior following certain physics. The player can deal damage to the Slime while Slimes cannot (for now.)

Next step: movement by formulas for slimes, UI, and Slime can deal damage to players too.

Made with Unity 2021.
